hatchback.description: The Swift was the game changer in our thriving car market back then. It looked quirky and showed us that a hatchback can be practical and fun at the same time. It also won the coveted Indian Car of the Year Award (ICOTY) in 2012.

The Altroz is Tata’s latest, most modern, and its most futuristic looking car. the Altroz stands out with the quirky black-finished sills running below the windows called the ‘shooting star beltline’, and the hidden rear door handle. Also prominent are the well-defined front wheel arches and sharp shoulder creases running across the sides. At the back, the sharply raked and contoured tailgate has integrated wrap-around LED taillamps.

Hyundai Grand i10 is a 5 seater hatchback. It is available in 2 variants, a 1197 cc, BS6 and a single Manual transmission. Other key specifications of the Grand i10 include a ground clearance of 165mm and boot space of 256 Liters. The Grand i10 is available in 4 colours. Over 1269 User reviews basis Mileage, Performance, Price and overall experience of users for Hyundai Grand i10.

sedan.description: That original Leaf has amazingly loyal and satisfied customers. They loved the tiny running costs, convenience of home charging, silence, and simple practicality. And they liked that at the top and bottom it was just a car - five seats, good boot, easy to drive, affordable to buy. People who have owned electric cars almost never return to combustion.

Hyundai Verna is a 5 seater. It is available in 11 variants, 3 engine options that are BS6 compliant and 2 transmission options: Manual and Automatic. Other key specifications of the Verna include a boot space of 480 Liters. The Verna is available in 6 colours. Over 75 User reviews basis Mileage, Performance, Price and overall experience of users for Hyundai Verna.

Skoda Rapid is a 5 seater sedan . It is available in 5 variants, a 999 cc, BS6 and a single Manual transmission. Other key specifications of the Rapid include a kerb weight of 1111kg, ground clearance of 163mm and boot space of 460 Liters. The Rapid is available in 4 colours. Over 245 User reviews basis Mileage, Performance, Price and overall experience of users for Skoda Rapid.

SUV.description: Tata Nexon EV Range, Electric Motor and Battery: The Nexon EV uses Tata's Ziptron EV powertrain technology that features a 30.2kWh lithium-ion battery with a claimed range of 312km. It gets an 8-year standard warranty and an IP67 waterproof battery pack.

Mahindra Scorpio is a 7 seater suv Other key specifications of the Scorpio include a ground clearance of 180mm and boot space of 460 Liters. Over 1527 User reviews basis Mileage, Performance, Price and overall experience of users for Mahindra Scorpio.

Kia Seltos is a 5 seater suv . Other key specifications of the Seltos include a boot space of 433 Liters. Over 2112 User reviews basis Mileage, Performance, Price and overall experience of users for Kia Seltos.

van.description: Mahindra brings you eSupro, a stylish , spacious van which is a whole new concept in cargo transportation and people movement. It is an advanced electric van that brings emissions down to zero, absolute zero. The eSupro van with zero emission has many advantages.

Tata Magic Diesel is a commercial vehicle by Tata Motors in the MUV segment. Magic comes with a 4 stroke 702cc engine giving a performance of 16 BHP @ 3200 rpm and 38 Nm @ 2000 rpm. At a price point of around 4.50 lakhs, Tata Magic has competition from Mahindra Maxximo which gives the same performance at a price point of 3.05 lakhs. TATA Magic has an impressive mileage of 17.9 kmpl.

Maruti Eeco is a 5 seater minivan. It is available in 4 variants, a 1196 cc, BS6 and a single Manual transmission. Other key specifications of the Eeco include a kerb weight of 1050kg, ground clearance of 160mm and boot space of 540 Liters. The Eeco is available in 6 colours. Over 177 User reviews basis Mileage, Performance, Price and overall experience of users for Maruti Eeco.

pickup.description: Isuzu D-MAX features and specifications make this truck highly popular in the Indian market. It comes with 4x4 axle configuration. This Truck is powered by a 2499 cc engine which produces 78 BHP of power and carries a 1200 kg of PayLoad. It’s 3050 mm Wheelbase and Power Steering makes it unique in this segment. This Truck’s 6 Speed Gearbox and Manual transmission makes for a smooth drive on Indian roads. You can check the details for the complete technical specification of Isuzu D-MAX Truck below.

The Tata Xenon Double Cabin is a perfect combination of style, design, comfort, safety features and performance. Tough, compact and sturdy, the Tata Xenon Double-Cabin pickup truck handles a range of chores across varied terrains. Its impressive list of features gives it a competitive edge over other brands.
pickup.entertainment: Harman Infotainment system with Android Auto and Car play

roadster.description: The i8 is now available in coupe and Roadster configurations, the latter boasting a power-folding top that can be lowered in 15 seconds. In addition, the battery now has a capacity of 11.6 kWh, allowing for an estimated EV range of 55 km for the coupe, 53 km for the Roadster. Finally, the plug-in hybrid powertrain gains 12 horsepower this year for a total of 369. Despite the i8's age, its futuristic styling still turns heads.
